definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: At the edge of the forest, behind the dunes, I set up my small tarp.
sentences.chinese: 在邊緣的森林，背後的沙丘，我設立了我的小篷布。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin, can be seen everywhere in China and is said not only very unique landscape.
sentences.chinese: 篷布，在中國不僅隨處可見而且是道很獨特的風景。

sentences.english: A composition for preparing tarpaulin is studied by using a tactic polypropylene and natural rubber.
sentences.chinese: 研究了無規聚丙烯與天然橡膠並用製備篷布的配方。

sentences.english: The tarp hangs from a barbwire fence which surrounds an abandoned, old compound.
sentences.chinese: 篷布掛在柵欄上，圈起一塊廢棄陳舊的場地。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin supports which by the branch, has formed the height fluctuation exhibition hall roofing.
sentences.chinese: 以樹枝支起的篷布，形成了高低起伏的展館屋面。

sentences.english: When I first used a tarp I was quite impressed.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次使用篷布的時候它給我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin with a heat sealing machine fight site, the product quality and cheap, sold in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 篷布拼幅用熱合機等，產品質優價廉，銷往多個國家。

sentences.english: A complex range suitable for finishing by coating, using the example of the production of truck tilts , is described.
sentences.chinese: 以卡車篷布爲例描述了適用於塗層後整理的整套流程。

sentences.english: The sign has been spray-painted on a large black tarp in big silver letters.
sentences.chinese: 指示牌噴在一塊黑色大篷布上，以大銀字鑲嵌。

definition: open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
variant of 車廂|车厢[che1 xiang1]
cord fabric used in vehicle tires
